search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Productboard (productboard.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Productboard can be found at: [https://www.productboard.com/pricing/](https://www.productboard.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Explore Productboard's offerings
--------------------------------

Starter
-------

Get started building better products

Free

Free for everyone

[Start free trial](https://app.productboard.com/register)

Includes

*   50 feedback notes
    
*   1 Teamspace
    
*   1 Objective
    
*   1 Product Portal
    
*   20+ additional integrations
    

Essentials
----------

Prioritize what your customers need and make what matters

$19 maker/month

Billed annually, or $25 billed monthly, starting with 1 maker

[Start free trial](https://app.productboard.com/register)

Everything in Starter, plus

*   250 feedback notes
    
*   2 Insights automations
    
*   Portal moderation
    
*   Feedback loop closing
    
*   Release planning
    
*   Usage reporting
    
*   Email support
    

Most popular

Pro
---

Align teams to drive real business outcomes

$59 maker/month

Billed annually, or $75 billed monthly, starting with 2 makers

[Start free trial](https://app.productboard.com/register)

Everything in Essentials, plus

*   Unlimited feedback notes
    
*   3 Teamspaces
    
*   10 Objectives
    
*   10 Insights automations
    
*   Manual customer segments
    
*   Customizable feature statuses, color scales, and data fields
    
*   Trended reporting
    
*   Prioritized email support
    

Enterprise
----------

For organizations to securely and scalably uplevel their entire product management processes

### Contact Sales

Starts with 5 makers

Everything in Pro, plus

*   Unlimited Teamspaces
    
*   Unlimited Objectives
    
*   Strategic planning
    
*   3+ Product Portals
    
*   SAML SSO & Google SSO
    
*   Salesforce integration
    
*   Efficiency & allocation reporting and audit logs
    
*   SCIM provisioning & granular permissions
    
*   Live onboarding & customer success support
    

Trusted by Fortune 500 and high-growth companies!
-------------------------------------------------

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

How does the free trial work? Do I need a credit card to try Productboard?

You can sign up for a free trial for free, no credit card needed. Once your trial ends, you can use our Starter plan for free or purchase one of our paid plans to continue using Productboard.

How do I purchase? What forms of payment do you accept - credit card and/or invoicing?

You can buy our Essentials and Pro plans through Productboard’s billing page using all major credit cards. To purchase the Enterprise plan and get set up on invoicing, please [**contact our sales team**](https://www.productboard.com/pricing/#form1071).

What are the different roles and their associated access? Which roles do I pay for?

Customers pay for the number of makers using Productboard. A **maker** has full access to edit, update, add, create and prioritize feature ideas, feedback notes, and roadmaps. **Makers with admin access** can also manage members, integrations, settings, and billing.

Every Productboard plan also includes unlimited **contributor** and **viewer** roles. **Contributors** can share ideas, requests, and customer feedback and access feature data and roadmaps, but cannot make updates. **Viewers** can only see the Roadmap (and the Portal if shared with them). They cannot add or make updates to Productboard.

How does onboarding work?

We designed Productboard’s trial onboarding experience to guide you through the most useful workflows and frequently used roadmaps, boards, and prioritization frameworks.

In addition, we offer dedicated Success & Support packages that can be added to any plan for customers interested in a more bespoke onboarding experience. [Learn more about our Success & Support offerings here](https://www.productboard.com/productboard-professional-services/).

How does adding and removing makers work?

If you are on a yearly plan, your contract includes a fixed minimum of makers. You cannot reduce the number of makers until your contract ends, but you can add new maker seats or upgrade your plan anytime!

If you are on a monthly plan, you can increase or reduce the number of licenses at any time in Productboard.

What support and services are available?

We offer a variety of free and paid services to support our customers. Learn more [here](https://www.productboard.com/productboard-professional-services/) about our onboarding, success management, support services, and community offerings.

Do you offer discounts for nonprofits?

Yes, we provide discounts for charitable nonprofits. For more information, [contact us](https://www.productboard.com/pricing/#form1586).

Is my data secure?

Yes, your data is safe with us. The security and privacy of your data is our number one priority. We perform regular security testing, work with third-party security specialists, and host our platform on the highly-secure AWS Amazon cloud. [Learn more](https://www.productboard.com/product/security/).

What integrations do you support?

We integrate with many development tools such as Jira, Azure DevOps, and GitHub, plus customer feedback tools like Slack, Zendesk, and Intercom. [Learn more](https://www.productboard.com/product/integrations/).

Have additional questions? Send us an email to [hello@productboard.com](mailto:hello@productboard.com)

Ready to make products people want?
-----------------------------------

[Start free trial](https://app.productboard.com/register)

Productboard pricing is tailored to your company size and stage, from early-stage start-ups to enterprises. Find a plan that works for you and your team.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes a free tier and subscription plans with annual and monthly billing options. Enterprise plan requires contacting sales.
